__GlobalAccessControlManaged_init(addres.details: this is assumed to be used in the initializer of the inhereiting contract

params._globalAccessControl: global access control which is pinged to allow / deny access to permissioned calls by role

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: this contract must have the rights to mint the citadel token to function correctlythis contract is intended to be the only way citadel is minted, with the expection of the initial minting event

params._gac: global access control which is pinged to allow / deny access to permissioned calls by role
params._supplySchedule: contract that determines how much citadel to mint at a given time

mintAndDistribute().details: In theory this call should be permissionless, and after sufficient security analysis this may be changed to be the case

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setCitadelDistributionSplit(uint256,uint.details: This is decided according to the treasury / marketcap logic outlined in the tokenomics, and is intended to be automated on-chain when safeSum of basis point values supplied must exactly equal 10000 (100%)

params._fundingBps: Percentage of newly minted citadel to be allocated to funding pools, in basis points
params._lockingBps: Percentage of newly minted citadel to be allocated to lockers as emitted xCitadel rewards, in basis points
params._stakingBps: Percentage of newly minted citadel to be allocated to stakers as auto-compounding xCitadel rewards, in basis points

setFundingPoolWeight(address,uint256).details: If the pool does not exist and is assigned a weightSetting the funding pool weight to 0 for an existing pool will delete it from the set

params._pool: Address of funding pool contract to add
params._weight: Weight to give to pool. Must be between 0 and 10000, inclusive

mintAndDistribute().notice: Update the state of citadel emissions by minting and distributing citadel tokens according to the emission schedule and proportional splits between destinations (e.g. funding pools, stakers, lockers)

setCitadelDistributionSplit(uint256,uint.notice: Set the proportions of newly minted citadel to go to funding pools, stakers, and lockers on mintAndDistribute() calls

setFundingPoolWeight(address,uint256).notice: Set the funding weight for a given address.

statements.documentation: Saves gas if the if is true, if it's not costs 6 extra gas

documentation.text:
@notice Update the state of citadel emissions by minting and distributing citadel tokens according to the emission schedule and proportional splits between destinations (e.g. funding pools, stakers, lockers)
 @dev In theory this call should be permissionless, and after sufficient security analysis this may be changed to be the case
